description.construction: Traditional 7-Ply - Traditional for a reason. Standard 7-ply wood construction gives you a deck that's durable, sturdy and poppy without breaking the bank.
description.trucks: Tensor Trucks - These lightweight trucks make it easier to blast ollies, and the responsive feel let's you turn on a dime.
description.wheels: Enjoi 52mm 100a Wheels - Designed for advanced skating and made to withstand flat-spotting, which can result from excessive sliding with softer durometer wheels. Designed for hard-charging, fast skating in mind.
description.bearings: ABEC 5 Bearings - Smooth, fast and durable, ABEC 5 bearings are essentially the go-to bearing for most street skaters.
